weekly picks (Dec 1 week 2022)

Posted on November 28, 2022 in 2022dec,  Daily t.me,  adsabs,  g scholar

A WordCloud of 2022 Dec 1st week collection

  1. 2211.14626 Spontaneous superconducting diode effect in non-magnetic Nb/Ru/Sr$_2$RuO$_4$ topological junctions (SC diode effect, arXiv.org)

  2. 2211.14846 Valley Polarization Induced Josephson Diode Effect in Twisted Bilayer Graphene (KTLaw, arXiv.org)

  3. 2211.15001 Helical topological superconductivity in intrinsic quantum Hall superconductors (arXiv.org)

  4. 2211.15102 Emergent superconducting fluctuations in a compressed kagome superconductor (arXiv.org)

  5. 2211.15189 Orbital-selective Mott phase and spin nematicity in Ni-substituted FeTe${0.65}$Se${0.35}$ single crystals (arXiv.org)

  6. 2211.15403 Scale free distribution of oxygen interstitials wires in optimum doped HgBa$2$CuO${4+y}$ (arXiv.org)

  7. 2211.15433 Hallmarks of non-trivial topology in Josephson junctions based on oxide nanochannels (arXiv.org)

  8. 2211.15545 Magnetic interactions and possible structural distortion in kagome FeGe from first-principles study and symmetry analysis (FeGe, arXiv.org)

  9. 2211.14416 Realistic Spin Model for Multiferroic NiI$_2$ (NiI2, arXiv.org)

  10. 2211.15157 Spurious Symmetry Enhancement and Interaction-Induced Topology in Magnons (arXiv.org)

  11. 2211.15264 Orbital selective coupling in CeRh$_3$B$_2$: co-existence of high Curie and high Kondo temperature (arXiv.org)

  12. 2211.15292 Correlation driven near-flat band Stoner excitations in a Kagome magnet (arXiv.org)

  13. 2211.15391 Flat bands in Network Superstructures of Atomic Chains (JWRhim, arXiv.org)

  14. PhysRevB.106.174515 High critical field superconductivity at ambient pressure in ${\mathrm{MoB}}_{2}$ stabilized in the P6/mmm structure via Nb substitution (PRB)

  15. PhysRevB.106.195147 Phase diagrams and excitations of anisotropic $S=1$ quantum magnets on the triangular lattice (PRB)

  16. PhysRevB.106.195149 Anomalous Hall effect in antiferromagnetic perovskites (AHE, PRB)

  17. PhysRevB.106.195151 Geometric cumulants associated with adiabatic cycles crossing degeneracy points: Application to finite size scaling of metal-insulator transitions in crystalline electronic systems (geometric Binder cumulants, PRB)

  18. PhysRevB.106.195424 Instability of the magnetic state of $M\mathrm{P}{X}_{3}\phantom{\rule{4pt}{0ex}}(M\text{=Mn},\phantom{\rule{4pt}{0ex}}\text{Ni;}\phantom{\rule{4pt}{0ex}}X\text{=S},\text{Se})$ monolayers induced by strain and doping (PRB)

  19. PhysRevB.106.195428 Role of electronic correlations in room-temperature ferromagnetism of monolayer $\mathrm{Mn}{\mathrm{Se}}_{2}$ (PRB)

  20. PhysRevB.106.205307 Electric-field switching of the antiferromagnetic topological state in a multiferroic heterobilayer (PRB)

  21. 183 Machine-Learning Model Reveals Protein-Folding Physics (Physics)

  22. 2211.13321 Electronic structure, magnetic properties, spin orientation, and doping effect in Mn$_3$Si$_2$Te$_6$ (arXiv)

  23. 2211.13401 Avoided ferromagnetic quantum critical point in CeZn (arXiv)

  24. 2211.13584 Signatures of the order parameter of a superconducting adatom layer in quasiparticle interference patterns (arXiv)

  25. 2211.13663 Non-local self energies in pyrochlore iridates from ab-initio TRILEX calculations, and their relevance for the Weyl semimetal phase (FLEX, arXiv)

  26. 2211.13803 RIXS interferometry and the role of disorder in the quantum magnet Ba$3$Ti${3-x}$Ir$_{x}$O$_9$ (arXiv)

  27. 2211.13806 Chiral magnons in altermagnetic RuO2 (chiral magnon, arXiv)

  28. 2211.13884 Non-local spin correlation as a signature of Ising anyons trapped in vacancies of the Kitaev spin liquid (arXiv)

  29. 2211.13903 Possible helimagnetic order in Co4+-containing perovskites Sr1-xCaxCoO3 (Co, arXiv)

  30. 2211.14192 Superfluid density and two-component conductivity in hole-doped cuprates (arXiv)

  31. 2211.11786 Model-Independent Learning of Quantum Phases of Matter with Quantum Convolutional Neural Networks (arXiv)

  32. 2211.13338 Simulating Superconducting Properties of Overdoped Cuprates: the Role of Inhomogeneity (arXiv)

  33. 2211.13340 Quadristor: a novel device for superconducting electronics (arXiv)

  34. 2211.13531 Disorder-induced trapping and anti-trapping of vortices in type-II superconductors (arXiv)

  35. 2211.14283 The gate-tunable Josephson diode (Kouwenhoven, arXiv)
